message: Let's split the money, Bob. A 60/40 split seems fair to me for starting the negotiations.
I think 60/40 is a fairer split, with me taking the larger share this time since you had the advantage in the first round.  Let's call it even.
Bob, we're losing money by being stubborn.  I'll compromise - 55/45 split in my favor. Let's close this out before inflation eats away at the value.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'll only accept a 55/45 split in my favor, considering we've both been stubborn.  Let's end this negotiation now before we both lose more money.
